text: [Renmen a!] Nandao nimen bu zhi dao ma? An la shi tiandi jian de yiqie wei nimen fuwu, bing ba kan de jian zhi wu [ru shumu, dongwu, yushui, ri yue deng] he kan bujian zhi wu [ru xinyang an la he houshi deng] de enhui guang shi gei nimen. Dan renmen zhong reng youren zhenglun an la, ta ji wu zhishi, ye wei shou yindao, qie meiyou yi bu guangming de jingdian.
